price: ߒ߬ ߕߏߟߏ߲ߕߐ߫ ߡߊ߫ ߛߊ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߘߎ߱ ߣߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߝߌ߬ߟߊ ߕߍߟߊ ߘߊ߲߫ ߘߋ߬
arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا لَٰعِبِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wamā khalaqnā al-samāa wal-arḍa wamā baynahumā lāʿibīna
